fields.name: **Weaken**:
fields.value: *During the day, target a player and mark their house for Consume. You cannot Weaken yourself. Selecting an already marked player will unmark them.*

fields.name: **Consume**:
fields.value: *At night, select a player marked by Weaken. Their house will collapse, blocking the effects of any direct visits made to them that night.*

fields.name: **Annihilate (Charge 110%, Astral)**:
fields.value: *Eradicate an unmarked player's house, attacking them. You will block visits the same way Consume does.*
